thread.title: ETA Celebrates Payments Innovation at the 2015 Strategic Leadership Forum
thread.title_full: ETA Celebrates Payments Innovation at the 2015 Strategic Leadership Forum

author: syndicated
title: ETA Celebrates Payments Innovation at the 2015 Strategic Leadership Forum
text:
Matt Johanson, Senior Vice President of Discover Network , Sofya Pogreb, COO of TrueAccord and Derek Webster, CEO of CardFlight on 
What the Payments Industry Can Learn From Startups, a panel that will discuss how to do innovation right and achieve success in a crowded field. 
Following lunch, James Mendelsohn, CMO of Can Capital, will discuss Technology & Innovation in Alternative Finance, exploringhow the alternative financing industry and processors can work together to better serve today’s small business community through new products and innovative technologies. 
Last but not least, the industry’s top acquirers will participate in a CEO Roundtable. We will hear from Angela Brown, President and CEO of Moneris Solutions , Simon Haslam, President and CEO of Elavon , Mike Passilla, CEO, Merchant Services at JPMorgan Chase and Debra Rossi, Executive Vice President at Wells Fargo on opportunities and challenges across the payments landscape. 
Attendees here at ETA SLF are looking forward to wrapping up an intense day of high-level interactive learning with a networking reception on the stunning Camelback patio, one of many tranquil hideaways at Scottsdale’s Camelback Inn and Resort. 
Check-in with ETA Transaction Trends again tomorrow for a glimpse of the final day of ETA SLF 2015, the exclusive annual gathering for the leading decision-makers in payments. 
Follow us on Twitter @ElecTranAssoc and stay tuned to Transactions Trends for the latest updates from #ETASLF15 – the most impactful payments tech gathering of the year! Share this:
